references: B. K. Teo and N. J. A. Sloane, Magic numbers in polygonal and polyhedral clusters, Inorgan. Chem. 24 (1985), 4545-4558.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
example: 9^18 + (9+1)^18 = 1150094635296999121 = 181 * 8461 * 750988536481, the minimum nontrivial number of prime factors.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
